doc.after: Since independence in 1968 Mauritius has developed from a low income agriculture based economy to a middle income diversified economy The economy is based on tourism textiles sugar and financial services In recent years information and communication technology seafood hospitality and property development healthcare renewable energy and education and training have emerged as important sectors attracting substantial investment from both local and foreign investors 65
